QuestData.Title: The Storm Gathers
QuestData.Description: There is no time to waste, $n. Every moment we delay here gives Jaina and the Kirin Tor more of a hold on the Isle.$b$bLor'themar awaits us. Speak to me when you are ready to depart. I will escort you there myself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel with Scout Captain Elsia to the Isle of Thunder.
